name: Diggy Diggy Mole
description:
2 Person Team, everything but the music was made over the 3 days.

Diggy Diggy Mole

Control the Mole and dig as deep as you can

Rocks hurt, dont hit them

Worms yum, eat them

Gold nuggets useful, grab them

Dont Die

Controls:
A/Left to turn left

D/Right to turn right

S to slow down

Purchase upgrades with gold

PRESS G THEN RESTART TO RESET PROGRESS

Good luck!

Please leave your highscores in the comments!
